publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-383 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government and Transport Committee be designated lead committee for the Prostitution Tolerance Zones (Scotland) Bill and that either the Justice 1 or Justice 2 Committee (to be decided between the committees) be designated secondary committee. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
